entry.title: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 06 at 11:24AM AKST until March 06 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Plan on difficult travel conditions.
